湢字的基本解释

湢
bì
浴室：“外内不共井，不共湢浴。”

湢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bì］
(1)浴室。
(2)形容整肃。
(3)见“湢測”。

湢字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　湢； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页637第24
【廣韻】彼側切【集韻】筆力切，?音逼。【玉篇】湢㳁，水驚涌貌。　又浴室謂之湢。【禮·內則】外內不共湢浴。【註】本又作偪。　又整肅貌。【賈誼·新書容經篇】軍旅之容，湢然肅然，固以猛。

湢字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
湢字的起名意思

暂无。

public bathhouse
Basic explanation of words
public bathhouse
bì
Bathroom: "There is no common well between the outside and the inside, and there is no common bath."
public bathhouse
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bì］
(1) Bathroom.
(2) Describe the purge.
(3) See "湢测".
public bathhouse
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　湢; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 637 24
[Guang Yun] Cut from the other side [Ji Yun] The pen is cut, and the sound is strong. [Jade articles] 湢㳁, the water is surging.　The bathroom is called 湢. 【Rite·Inside】Do not share a bath outside and inside. [Note] This is forced again.　Clean up appearance again. [Jia Yi·New Book Rongjing Chapter] The military's capacity is awe-inspiring and solid.
